广告牌 https://www.billboard.com音乐排行榜、新闻、照片和视频2023 年 10 月 13 日星期五 16:10:09 +0000 en-US每小时1 https://wordpress.org/?v=6.2.3 HighKey 耳鼻喉科。名单：2023 年 5 强艺术家https://www.billboard.com/music/music-news/highkey-enterprises-top-artists-of-2023-1235441534/ Fri, 13 Oct 2023 16:10:00 +0000 MusicMusic NewsAscendAgency https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235441534 Highkey Enterprises released a list of their top artists in 2023, check out who they tapped below.

本文是与 Highkey Enterprises 合作创建的。

音乐让我们的灵魂充满希望、灵感和安慰。 Highkey Enterprises 2023 年顶级艺术家体现了这些特征，并通过超越所有噪音和排斥而征服了音乐世界。

本文旨在庆祝那些有远见的艺术家，他们在这个竞争激烈的行业中无所畏惧地开辟了自己的道路，推动他们在 2023 年走在音乐世界的最前沿。加入我们，探索这些敢于与众不同的非凡人物的故事，在全球音乐版图上留下了不可磨灭的印记，并激励着子孙后代。

鬼爱我

GhostLuvMe的音乐历程可以追溯到他 10 岁时童年时期的两个关键时刻。第一次是当他开始学习弹弗拉门戈吉他时，最终引导他创作了自己的音乐。第二个时刻是悲惨的，他因枪支暴力失去了母亲和两个姐妹。这次活动给了他对生活的独特视角，为他的说唱名字提供了灵感来源，并为他的音乐事业提供了一份保险索赔。

GhostLuvMe 在佛罗里达州布劳沃德县出生并长大，于 2017 年搬到洛杉矶追求他的音乐事业。然而，他很快意识到这座城市更适合知名艺术家，而不是那些试图成名的艺术家。尽管如此，他在洛杉矶的时间让他能够与著名制作人斯科特·斯托奇合作开发他的声音。

在洛杉矶短暂停留后，GhostLuvMe 搬回东海岸，这次是亚特兰大。正是在这里，他与 Zaytoven 合作发行了 Ghosttoven 磁带，实现了职业生涯中的一个重要里程碑。从那时起，他与多位艺术家合作，包括 Future、Lil Uzi Vert、Raekwon 和 Ghostface Killah。

作为一名受过古典音乐训练的多乐器演奏家，GhostLuvMe 非常擅长演奏任何弦乐、钢琴和鼓。他是一位多产的音乐创作者，创作了数千首歌曲。虽然他可以组装、演奏和制作自己的音乐，但他喜欢与外部制作人合作，为自己的风格增添多样性。 2023 年，他计划发行两盘磁带：《Bohunk》和《Popstar Degenerate》，分别由 Brandon Finesin 和 Tragic 制作。

利亚姆·麦克唐纳

利亚姆·麦克唐纳 (Liam McDonald) ，以他的艺名 OPLIAM 闻名，是一位充满活力的独奏艺术家，也是芝加哥三人摇滚乐队的魅力主唱。利亚姆在明尼苏达州的风景中出生和长大，深受该地区丰富的土著激进主义传统的影响，这点燃了他对音乐和社会变革的热情。

从很小的时候起，利亚姆就以令人惊叹的表演点燃了舞台。他在明尼苏达州的众多草根美洲原住民环保活动中首次亮相。

利亚姆沉浸在充满活力的土著音乐场景中，有幸与全国各地的知名乐队同台演出，其中包括格莱美奖得主葡萄牙 The Man、果戈里·博尔德罗 (Gogol Bordello) 和 The Halluci Nation。他通过蓝调摇滚、另类摇滚和雷鬼影响的独特融合，巩固了自己在另类摇滚界的地位。

利亚姆的音乐是他致力于原住民权利和环保主义的强大渠道。他的著名作品之一《土地回归》是一首回归故土的颂歌，强调了原住民与其环境之间的联系。

利亚姆因其激进主义努力而受到当之无愧的赞誉。企鹅兰登书屋甚至邀请他撰写一本原住民历史书，为备受推崇的“真实历史”文学系列做出贡献。这个机会使利亚姆能够进一步放大原住民的声音，并启发读者了解原住民文化和斗争的丰富内容。利亚姆的书《美国原住民》获得了《学校图书馆杂志》令人垂涎的“星级评论”的好评。

他并没有就此止步。利亚姆刚刚发布了他的第三个大项目，题为“所有道路都很好”。这张新专辑是在路上创作的，混合了摇滚民谣、实验和原声曲目。该项目是在隔离期间录制的，描绘了我们当前时代的痛苦而美丽的表现。随着每一次新的艺术尝试，利亚姆都在改变我们听音乐的方式。

罗比·特里普

今年很少有艺术家能与病毒说唱歌手和网络名人罗比·特里普（Robbie Tripp）的创意作品相媲美。这位两极分化的拉斯维加斯艺术家发布了一系列令人印象深刻的作品，为他的项目增添了一系列明星云集的联合签名和合作者。

特里普以他的单曲“Chubby sexy”首次亮相主流，这是一首朗朗上口的健康赞歌，被《GQ》杂志在其年度“年度男士”特刊中评为“年度时刻”。罗比的下一首单曲“卢卡·东契奇”成为亿万富翁马克·库班在达拉斯小牛队比赛中的最爱。特里普（曾是一名大学篮球运动员）在盐湖城举行的 2023 年 NBA 全明星周末期间演唱了这首歌。

去年夏天，罗比·特里普 (Robbie Tripp) 作为一名艺术家的真正突破时刻到来了，当时他在 Tik Tok 上走红的歌曲《Big Girl Banger》在应用程序上掀起了全球舞蹈潮流。 《Big Girl Banger》的官方音乐录影带由特里普通过他的独立媒体制作公司 Desert Money 执导和制作，《炫耀杂志》将特里普称为“健康的身体积极性的波斯特·马龙”。

2023 年，特里普发行了《Basic Bro》，震撼了嘻哈界，这是一首充满活力的单曲和音乐视频，在特里普的全球平台上获得了数百万次观看，并在流行说唱博客 WorldstarHipHop 和 No Jumper 上引起了病毒式反应。 Tripp 随后推出了与 BlocBoy JB 合作的《 They Said 》，并与这位以歌曲《Look Alive》而闻名的孟菲斯说唱明星与 Drake 进行了大规模的联名，这首歌在 Billboard Hot 100 排行榜上排名第五。

这位拉斯维加斯创作者目前正在紧锣密鼓地推出他最新发行的备受期待的单曲“I Wanna Have Fun…”，该单曲由三届格莱美奖得主、坎耶·韦斯特 (Kanye West) 畅销专辑的长期混音工程师安德鲁·道森 (Andrew Dawson) 制作。

特里普告诉公告牌：“我为梦想而充满活力！”

最年轻的健美运动员

最年轻的 Flexer Alive是一位来自加拿大的新兴音乐艺术家，现在居住在充满活力的迈阿密市，那里的阳光和蓝天激发了他的创造力。这位年仅19岁的年轻神童正以其不可否认的才华在音乐界掀起波澜。

最年轻的 Flexer Alive 在多伦多出生和长大，他从小对音乐的热情塑造了他的成功之旅。

Youngest Flexer Alive 的音乐与各个年龄段的观众产生共鸣，以其独特的感染力节奏和相关歌词的融合俘获了人们的心。他即将推出的首张单曲有望成为他才华的引人注目的展示，他的粉丝们热切地等待着它的发行。他致力于真实性，为每首歌注入青春活力和对他生活经历的诚实反映，确保与他不断增长的粉丝群建立真正的联系。

作为一名艺术家，最年轻的 Flexer Alive 对自己的独立性和创造性控制力感到非常自豪。他积极与顶尖制作人和艺术家同行合作，将他的愿景融入迷人的音乐之旅。工作室已成为他的避难所，他在这里完善自己的技艺，释放无限的创造力，突破音乐表达的界限。

除了音乐追求之外，最年轻的 Flexer Alive 还专注于打造自己的品牌并扩大影响力。他认识到与观众建立联系的重要性，因此巧妙地利用社交媒体平台与粉丝互动并分享他的艺术过程。他在 Spotify 和其他在线平台上的出现体现了他致力于对音乐行业产生持久影响的承诺。

凭借坚定不移的决心和坚定不移的成功动力，最年轻的健美运动员注定会成就伟大。当他准备发行他备受期待的首张单曲时，人们的兴奋和期待与日俱增，因为他富有感染力的能量和创新的方法有望推动他作为一名艺术家和年轻的开拓者走向光明和充满希望的未来。全世界都在他的脚下，The Youngest Flexer Alive 已准备好征服全世界音乐爱好者的心，并在业界留下不可磨灭的印记。

伊利克斯

破碎的梦想可以重建，无论多么破碎。证据？这个人的作品让大众着迷，并为他赢得了这份名单上的一席之地：聪明而令人难以置信的音乐家，名叫Elyrix 。

17 岁时，他已经赚到了人生中的第一个 100 万美元，每天都和朋友们一起向里克·罗斯 (Rick Ross) 留言。但赌博、高级俱乐部和无尽的夜晚的奢侈生活方式却造成了损失，耗尽了每一块钱。然而，当许多人都崩溃了时，Elyrix 却深入挖掘。在不眠之夜的编码和 Rick Ross 国歌的节奏的推动下，他比以往任何时候都更加努力。自始至终，音乐的节奏始终是他的支柱。

他早期的音乐真实、未经过滤地反映了他的旅程。到第三张专辑时，与行业巨头的合作占据了中心舞台：与 Atl Jacob 合作的节拍、与 Lil Baby 合作的歌曲，以及 Rick Ross 的第一个百万专辑的灵感来源的强大功能。这张专辑中充斥着其他大牌专辑，展示了 Elyrix 在音乐界不可否认的影响力。当我们在年底等待他的第四件艺术作品时，很明显：Elyrix 不仅仅是播放列表上的一个名字。他是一种气氛、一种情感、一种运动。

他对各种流派的无畏探索让听众保持警惕，始终期待他的下一步行动。每首曲目都是一次新鲜的体验，证明了他的创新精神。

从蒙特利尔到全球舞台，Elyrix 的故事不仅仅与音乐有关。它关乎重塑、韧性和对激情的不懈追求。深入研究他的声音，您就会明白：Elyrix 不仅制作音乐，而且致力于制作音乐。他正在创造回忆。

16000位嘉宾的听专辑聚会是否温馨？特别的？显然，是的。 Bad Bunny在周四（10 月 12 日）首次推出了他的新唱片Nadie Sabe Lo Que Va a Pasar Mañana，实现了这一目标。

该活动在圣胡安标志性的波多黎各 José Miguel Agrelot（又名 El Choli）举行，活动的日程在宣布时还是个谜。坏兔子会出现吗？或者粉丝们会在没有他的情况下简单地逐首曲目地聆听专辑吗？没有人知道。尽管如此，门票在发售后两小时内就被抢购一空。

音乐会观众的期望各不相同，其中许多人戴着牛仔帽和靴子，以及闪闪发光的流苏上衣和裙子，给人一种文艺复兴的感觉。 （当然，坏兔子的新签名，洛杉矶道奇队的蓝色帽子，也出现在人群中。）一些歌迷很高兴在朋友中听到这张专辑并拥有一流的声音。然而，其他人则希望更多。

Bad Bunny 放弃《Nadie Sabe Lo Que Va a Pasar Mañana》：立即播放他的新专辑

2023年10月13日

“Espero que Bad Bunny salga — en un caballo（我希望 Bad Bunny 骑着马出来），”33 岁的 Dariana Cruz 向Billboard开玩笑说。 “他不一定要唱歌，但至少应该出来。”

克鲁兹没有实现她希望他骑马出来的愿望，但坏兔子确实出现了——而且以惊人的方式出现。在竞技场地板中央，在喧闹的粉丝的包围下，一辆经过改装的老式劳斯莱斯银影（《Where She Goes》的视频和他在 2023 年 Billboard 拉丁音乐奖表演中使用的同一辆车）慢慢地从天花板。粉丝尖叫。坏兔子坐在驾驶座上。

下面的汽车周围围着十几个舞者，他们全都穿着黑色衣服，脸上完全被类似巴拉克拉法帽的东西遮住，但眼睛却被封住，看起来像外星人。坏兔子也穿着同样的衣服，头上顶着一块格子手帕。

专辑以按时间顺序播放的曲目开始，从“Nadie Sabe”开始。 El Conejo 巧妙地点点头，与歌曲中沉思的语气相匹配，他在歌曲中反思了自己的轨迹。 10 年前，他还是个青少年的时候就开始创作音乐，如今他已经快 30 岁了，拥有五张完整专辑以及大量 EP 和单曲。在这首歌中，坏兔子似乎正在努力应对他不断飙升的名气以及随之而来的孤独感。

第一个数字对于定下当晚的基调至关重要。这就是坏兔子让成千上万的人感到亲近的原因，尽管他开着一辆 99% 的粉丝都买不起的豪华车，高出他们约 20 英尺。在“Nadie Sabe”期间以及整晚的某些时刻，他似乎在看着人群，真正寻找个体的面孔，寻求反馈或认可。

粉丝们的积极反应赢得了坏兔子的感激之情，他们以祈祷之手和衷心低头的形式表达了谢意。

随着夜幕降临，能量逐渐增强，陷阱重的曲目（他给了人们他们想要的东西）和准备好演奏的即兴演奏。然而，一个令人惊讶的数字是节奏耐心的“VOU 787”，它采样了麦当娜的“Vogue”中纤细的合成器乐器。

《坏兔子》得到了几位专辑嘉宾的协助，他们爬上了位于会场地板一角的巨大的干草覆盖的 VIP 区域，排成一排。出席者包括 Young Miko、Feid、Bryant Meyers、Arcangel 和 Tainy。共有约50名特邀嘉宾在这座西式建筑上起立跳舞。

坏兔子在几首歌中避开了面具，这位西装革履的歌手开始在车外跳舞。车子一点一点地下降，最终，他跳下了站台，走进了人群。他在自己的签名运动鞋上签名，人们在展会前排了几个小时的队购买这双鞋。一位音乐会观众似乎没有准备好记号笔，而坏兔子则用递给他的酒红色唇彩装饰了鞋子的顶部。

坏兔子随后进入了 VIP 区。他不紧不慢地向六排的每一个人打招呼。然而不知何故，坏兔子在他的巡演中保持了一定的编排，在几位合作者的歌曲开始播放时就到达了他们的身边。他与费德并肩演唱了他的长片《Perro Negro》和 Arcángel 的《Acho PR》，这让观众感到高兴。

之前发布的“Un Preview”——顾名思义，作为专辑预告片于 9 月底发布——是Nadie Sabe Lo Que Va a Pasar Mañana 的最后一首歌曲，因此，它为当晚画上了圆满的句号。但坏兔子并没有让歌迷们感到惊讶：他不是简单地播放这首歌，而是表演了它。

Bad Bunny 在 VIP 区唱歌，他的合作者和朋友都为他加油。但他还是沿着临时搭建的干草堆走下去，离歌迷更近了，歌迷们边跳舞边唱着、尖叫着歌词传回给他。贝尼托将拳头捶在胸前，大声喊道： “波多黎各，los quiero，puñeta”，一阵浓雾在贝尼托周围升起。

《死侍 3》的导演肖恩·利维近距离见识了泰勒·斯威夫特的导演技巧，他认为这位歌手具备电影大亨的素质。斯威夫特执导（或联合导演）了她的歌曲视频，包括《The Man》、《Me!》而《 All Too Well 》的 10 分钟迷你电影已经表示，她的下一个戏法正在考虑拍一部故事片，而 Levy 就是为此而准备的。

泰勒·斯威夫特 (Taylor Swift) 出席《Eras》电影首映式：巡演“我一生中最激动人心的体验”

2023年10月13日

当《娱乐周刊》杂志询问斯威夫特在与他共同主演了一部影片后是否向他询问过关于执导一部影片的建议时，利维告诉《娱乐周刊》 ：“泰勒没有就即将到来的导演项目咨询过我，但我认为她具备成为一名导演的潜质。”她的父亲在短片“All Too Well”中。虽然由于好莱坞演员正在进行罢工，利维无法谈论在斯威夫特执导的短片中表演的感受，但他表示这位歌手在镜头背后有着令人印象深刻的愿景。

“这个清单很短。泰勒，她对自己想要的创意作品的愿景的深度，无论是歌词、旋律、桥梁、音乐会巡演还是视频，都是深刻的，”他在编制两名女性艺术家名单时说道其文化影响力超乎寻常；顺便说一句，他名单上唯一的另一个名字是碧昂丝。

“它非常生动，她的信念很坚定，”利维补充道，称斯威夫特为“一代人的声音和创造力”，然后将这一愿景与三届奥斯卡奖得主史蒂文·斯皮尔伯格所信奉的哲学联系起来。

; 周五音乐指南：来自 Bad Bunny、Offset、Ice Spice 和 Rema 等的新音乐https://www.billboard.com/music/pop/friday-music-guide-bad-bunny-offset-ice-spice-1235441696/ Fri, 13 Oct 2023 15:16:54 +0000 MusicPopfirst streamfriday music guideMusic News https://www.billboard.com/?p=1235441696 Check out the must-hear releases of the week.

Billboard's Friday Music Guide serves as a handy guide to this Friday's most essential releases — the key music that everyone will be talking about today, and that will be dominating playlists this weekend and beyond.

This week, Bad Bunny returns sooner than expected, Offset corrals his famous friends and Ice Spice links up with Rema for a new hit. Check out all of this week's picks below:

Bad Bunny, Nadie Sabe Lo Que Va a Pasar Mañana

Thought you had to wait until 2024 for Bad Bunny's next opus, which would follow last year's enormous Un Verano Sin Ti ? A lot of us did — there's a reason why his new semi-surprise project is titled Nadie Sabe Lo Que Va a Pasar Mañana (“Nobody Knows What Will Happen Tomorrow”), considering how widespread the belief was that the Puerto Rican superstar would sit patiently until the calendar flipped. Instead, Bad Bunny has gifted another 80 minutes of dynamic solo material: zero guests are credited on Nadie Sabe Lo Que Va a Pasar Mañana , and while some are sprinkled throughout, there's clearly been a conscious decision to delineate between the summer-ready opulence of Un Verano Sin Ti and his captivating next phase. Bad Bunny's latest requires due diligence before a snap judgment, but needless to say, it's good to have him back sooner than anticipated.

Offset, Set It Off

The cover of new Offset solo album finds the rap star falling away from the world as it explodes away from him, the sky and ground inverted; after Quavo's somber Rocket Power , which reflected on Takeoff's untimely death throughout its track list, Offset's new artwork could be construed as a reaction to his fellow Migos member's passing. While Set It Off does contemplate grief and unspoken words (see the late highlight “Upside Down”), Offset's latest also revels in blockbuster-rap elegance — especially in its first half, which includes guest spots from Travis Scott, Don Toliver and Offset's wife, Cardi B.

Ice Spice feat. Rema, “Pretty Girl”

During her meteoric rise, Ice Spice has never compromised her style or relaxed her flow to fit in with mainstream expectations — but on crackling new single “Pretty Girl,” featuring Nigerian superstar Rema, the rapper showcases her ability to translate her effortless rhyming into a traditional pop structure, and scores one of the most likable singles of her career. “Pretty Girl” benefits from an Afrobeats-adjacent thump and the melodic charisma that Rema flaunted on “Calm Down,” but Ice Spice dominates the track, each of her bars a dart that hits its mark.

Troye Sivan, Something to Give Each Other

Troye Sivan has always possessed a distinct pop voice — both literally, with his warm, richly developed tone, and figuratively, as a former YouTuber making fundamentally sound and unabashedly queer pop music. Yet “Rush,” the thrilling lead single to third album Something to Give Each Other , hinted that his song construction had leveled up, and the full-length has confirmed as much: not every song on his new project carries the tempo of “Rush,” but from the robo-fantasia of “One of Your Girls” to the clap-along lullaby of “Can't Go Back, Baby,” Something to Give Each Other gives Sivan the sonic depth required to help his voice fully soar.

Boygenius, The Rest

Prior to a breakout 2023 in which they released their debut full-length and headlined arenas, Lucy Dacus, Phoebe Bridgers and Julien Baker conjured magic with a six-song EP in 2018, unveiling Boygenius as a collaborative project and slowly winning over thousands of listeners. The Rest , a new four-song EP, arrives in very different circumstances for the group yet feels just as intimate, a short, moving songwriting showcase defined by sparse arrangements and overlapping voices; the closer “Power,” in particular, feels like a summation for this phase of Boygenius, with Baker singing about “a crooked little trajectory” before being joined by her best friends.

Editor's Pick: Fred again.. feat. Jozzy, “Ten”

As he caps off a string of shows in New York and Los Angeles, effectively putting an exclamation point on a professional period during which he ascended to dance's A-list, Fred again.. has also unveiled one of the more satisfying grooves of his career: “Ten,” a new single with Jozzy, plays with space and vocal pitches, but that percussive hook is as wonderfully woozy as Fred hoped it would be, and Jozzy makes his presence felt in a short amount of time. “Ten” begs to be presented to and bopped with a crowd of thousands — lucky for those with Fred again.. tickets this month.

Autumn ’s arrival comes just five months after Sheeran last hit No. 1, when his previous studio set, – (Subtract) , launched at No. 1 on the May 20-dated tally, spending a week in charge. Only one other act has had two albums at No. 1 in 2023, but they did so with a carryover title that first hit No. 1 in 2022: Taylor Swift. Her Midnights album had 14 weeks at No. 1 nonconsecutively from Nov. 5, 2022, through June 10, 2023, while her Speak Now (Taylor's Version) debuted at No. 1 on the July 22, 2023, chart, logging two weeks at No. 1.

Autumn Variations was announced on Aug. 24, a little over a month before the album was released on Sept. 29.

Also in the top 10 of the new Top Album Sales chart: titles from NCT, Joe Hisaishi and Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, Wilco, Grateful Dead, Lil Peep all debut in the top 10, while Green Day's Dookie re-enters the chart in the top 10 after its 30th anniversary reissue, and Jason Isbell's Southeastern surges back onto the chart following its 10th anniversary reissue.

Billboard ’s Top Album Sales chart ranks the top-selling albums of the week based only on traditional album sales. The chart's history dates back to May 25, 1991, the first week Billboard began tabulating charts with electronically monitored piece count information from SoundScan, now Luminate. Pure album sales were the sole measurement utilized by the Billboard 200 albums chart through the list dated Dec. 6, 2014, after which that chart switched to a methodology that blends album sales with track equivalent album units and streaming equivalent album units. For all chart news, follow @billboard and @billboardcharts on both Twitter and Instagram.

Of Autumn Variations ' 46,500 first-week sales, physical sales comprise 33,500 (17,500 on CD and 16,000 on vinyl – his largest week ever on vinyl) and digital downloads comprise a little over 13,000. The set also launches at No. 1 on the Vinyl Albums chart, marking his fourth No. 1 on the 12-year-old tally. The album's debut-week sales were bolstered by its availability across five vinyl variants, a signed CD and a deluxe digital edition of the album with live versions of each of the album's songs.

Olivia Rodrigo's Guts falls 1-2 on Top Album Sales with nearly 16,000 sold (down 31%). NCT's Golden Age: The 4th Album debuts at No. 3 with 13,000 sold, marking the third top 10-charting effort for the Korean pop ensemble.

Joe Hisaishi and Royal Philharmonic Orchestra's A Symphonic Celebration: Music From the Studio Ghibli Films of Hayao Miyazaki bows at No. 4, following its vinyl release on Sept. 29. The set was initially released via digital download and CD on June 30. In the week ending Oct. 5, the Celebration album sold 12,500 copies – with 12,000 of that sum on vinyl, marking the single biggest sales week for a classical album on vinyl since Luminate began electronically tracking music sales in 1991. (Its vinyl sales were enhanced by its availability in five vinyl variants.)

With 12,500 overall copies sold, Celebration logs the second-largest sales week for a classical album released in 2023, following Def Leppard's Drastic Symphonies (15,000; June 3-dated chart).

Wilco logs its ninth top 10-charting effort on Top Album Sales as the band's new studio set, Cousin , debuts at No. 5 with a little over 12,000 copies sold. Green Day's Dookie re-enters the chart at No. 6 with 11,000 sold (up 1,744%) following its 30th anniversary deluxe reissue. The album peaked at No. 2 in 1995 and hasn't been in the top 10 since April of that year. Grateful Dead's Wake of the Flood debuts on Top Album Sales at No. 7 following its 50th anniversary reissue. The set, first released in 1973, sold nearly 10,500 copies in the tracking week (up from a negligible sum the previous week). Jason Isbell also celebrates an anniversary, as his Southeastern album re-enters at No. 8 – a new peak and its first week in the top 10 – with 10,000 sold (up 4,723%) after its 10th anniversary reissue. The album originally peaked at No. 23 in June of 2013.

The physical commercial debut of Lil Peep's 2016 mixtape Hellboy prompts the album's debut at No. 9 on Top Album Sales with nearly 10,000 sold. It was released via CD, vinyl and cassette on Sept. 29, but was previously available as a digital download (and via streaming services). It's the fourth top 10-charting set for the late rapper, who died in 2017. All of his charting efforts on Top Album Sales debuted on the list following his passing.

Closing out the top 10 on Top Album Sales is V's Layover , which falls 3-10 with 9,000 sold (down 22%).

In the week ending Oct. 5, there were 1.695 million albums sold in the US (up 8.8% compared to the previous week). Of that sum, physical albums (CDs, vinyl LPs, cassettes, etc.) comprised 1.369 million (up 11.1%) and digital albums comprised 327,000 (down 0.1%).

There were 573,000 CD albums sold in the week ending Oct. 5 (up 6.7% week-over-week) and 784,000 vinyl albums sold (up 14.2%). Year-to-date CD album sales stand at 26.160 million (up 0.5% compared to the same time frame a year ago) and year-to-date vinyl album sales total 34.883 million (up 19.4%).

Overall year-to-date album sales total 75.521 million (up 6.0% compared to the same year-to-date time frame a year ago). Year-to-date physical album sales stand at 61.449 million (up 10.4%) and digital album sales total 14.071 million (down 9.7%).

Over nearly four decades, Billboard Boxscore has charted the biggest tours in the world. From Whitney Houston and Billy Joel in the '80s to SZA and Post Malone in 2023, artists have topped Boxscore charts in Vegas theaters, international stadiums and everything in between.

Earlier this year, road warrior Elton John broke the record for the highest grossing tour of all time with the Farewell Yellow Brick Road Tour. His tour began in September 2018, was interrupted by COVID for two years, and returned stronger than ever — and stronger than everyone else. Now, after more than 300 shows, the tour has ended, further extending its lead as the first tour to earn more than $900 million.

Most recently, Beyoncé broke the top 10, as the Renaissance World Tour closed on Oct. 1, 2023. One of four 2023 tours crowding the leaderboard, the Renaissance World Tour breaks up the near-monopoly of British rock acts, edging out Roger Waters ' The Wall Live.

The updated top 10 tours of all-time include previous record-holders by Ed Sheeran and The Rolling Stones, as well as live legends such as Guns N' Roses .

John's triumphant farewell tour is one of four in the top 10 with post-pandemic results, but more upheaval could be on the way. Still on the road, Sheeran recently slipped by the $400 million mark with his current tour, with more shows scheduled for this year. And that's not to mention post-pandemic treks by P!nk , Taylor Swift , The Weeknd and more.

An influx of tours by these artists would not just help to modernize the top 10 but, on the back of Beyoncé's entrance, would add more diversity, breaking up a current roster that includes seven tours by classic rock acts, eight acts from the UK and Ireland, and a top 10 that is almost exclusively white and male.
